content: that back bar some projects work better without the back chosen colors never be bar such as lacy items in this pattern including the back afraid to undo your work color b bar will help make your scarf sturdier with less airiness and start over to fix it the between the row a good example of using the back bar is row 13 half_double_crochet blo in each st across fasten_off b time will pass anyway and demonstrated in this video from planetjune you ll be happier in the end weave in all remaining tails and enjoy your new scarf you may sell items made from this pattern but may not redistribute or sell the pattern itself share with friends by giving them a link to the ravelry pattern page or to the funwithyarn blog page 1 of 1 timber unisex crochet scarf pattern ©2015 2022 mich hooker funwithyarn wordpress com
